title: Progress on Paddy Purchasing  Programme in 2011 Yala Season
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the progress of the programme of purchasing paddy in the Yala Season 2011, presented by Hon. Johnston Fernando, Minister of Co-operatives and Internal Trade, giving the following details totaling to 31,863 MT. as at 07.09.2011: 
									

		*	Polonnaruwa Zone		-	        12,982  MT 
		*	Wayamba Zone		-	         	2059  MT
		*	Ampara Zone		-		5715  MT
		*	Anuradhapura Zone		-		4143  MT
		*	Southern Zone		-		4330  MT
		*	Northern Zone		-		  105  MT
		*	Eastern Zone			-		2528  MT
